entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:11 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -27.1°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -32.4°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
